verses.verse: The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> again to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, 'The Lord's <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>times<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> as <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocations<s%> â€“ My <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>times<s%> are these: <S%H428><s%>

'For <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> may be <S%H6213>done;<s%> but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> there is a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of <S%H7677>complete<s%> <S%H7677>rest,<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation.<s%> You shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work;<s%> it is a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>dwellings.<s%>

<S%H428>'These<s%> are the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>times<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> at the <S%H4150>times<s%> <S%H4150>appointed<s%> for them.
'In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> day of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>twilight<s%> is the Lord's <S%H6453>Passover.<s%>

'Then on the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> there is the <S%H2282>Feast<s%> of <S%H4682>Unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>Bread<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread.<s%>

'On the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> you shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5656>laborious<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%>

'But for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H7126>present<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> On the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> you shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5656>laborious<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%>' "
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3588>'When<s%> you <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I am going to <S%H5414>give<s%> to you and <S%H7114>reap<s%> its <S%H7105>harvest,<s%> then you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> in the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> of the <S%H7225>first<s%> <S%H7225>fruits<s%> of your <S%H7105>harvest<s%> to the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

'And he shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for you to be <S%H7522>accepted;<s%> on the <S%H4283>day<s%> <S%H4283>after<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H5130>wave<s%> it.

'Now on the <S%H3117>day<s%> when you <S%H5130>wave<s%> the <S%H6016>sheaf,<s%> you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> a <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lamb<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect<s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'Its grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> shall then be two-tenths [of an ephah] of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with <S%H8081>oil,<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> [for] a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma,<s%> with its <S%H5262>libation,<s%> a <S%H7243>fourth<s%> of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine.<s%>

<S%H5704>'Until<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> you have <S%H935>brought<s%> in the <S%H7133>offering<s%> of your <S%H430>God,<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H7039>roasted<s%> <S%H7039>grain<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3759>new<s%> <S%H3759>growth.<s%> It is to be a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> <S%H4186>places.<s%>

'You shall also <S%H5608>count<s%> for yourselves from the <S%H4283>day<s%> <S%H4283>after<s%> the <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> when you <S%H935>brought<s%> in the <S%H6016>sheaf<s%> of the <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering;<s%> there shall be <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H8549>complete<s%> <S%H7676>sabbaths.<s%>

'You shall <S%H5608>count<s%> <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> to the <S%H4283>day<s%> <S%H4283>after<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H7676>sabbath;<s%> then you shall <S%H7126>present<s%> a <S%H2319>new<s%> grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'You shall <S%H935>bring<s%> in from your <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> <S%H4186>places<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> [loaves] of <S%H3899>bread<s%> for a <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering,<s%> made of two-tenths [of an ephah]; they shall be of a <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour,<s%> <S%H644>baked<s%> with <S%H2557>leaven<s%> as <S%H1061>first<s%> <S%H1061>fruits<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H5921>'Along<s%> with the <S%H3899>bread,<s%> you shall <S%H7126>present<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H8549>without<s%> <S%H8549>defect,<s%> and a <S%H6499>bull<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> of the <S%H1241>herd,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H352>rams;<s%> they are to be a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> with their grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and their <S%H5262>libations,<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> of a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'You shall also <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> one <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> for a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8002>peace<s%> <S%H8002>offerings.<s%>

'The <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall then <S%H5130>wave<s%> them with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of the <S%H1061>first<s%> <S%H1061>fruits<s%> for a <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H8573>offering<s%> with <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> they are to be <S%H6944>holy<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for the <S%H3548>priest.<s%>

'On <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H7121>make<s%> a <S%H7121>proclamation<s%> as well; you are to <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation.<s%> You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5656>laborious<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%> It is to be a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> <S%H4186>places<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

'When you <S%H7114>reap<s%> the <S%H7105>harvest<s%> of your <S%H776>land,<s%> moreover, you shall not <S%H7114>reap<s%> to the very <S%H6285>corners<s%> of your <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3950>gather<s%> the <S%H3951>gleaning<s%> of your <S%H7105>harvest;<s%> you are to <S%H5800>leave<s%> them for the <S%H6041>needy<s%> and the <S%H1616>alien.<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>' "
Again the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'In the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> of the <S%H2320>month,<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H7677>rest,<s%> a <S%H2146>reminder<s%> by <S%H8643>blowing<s%> [of trumpets], a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation.<s%>
'You shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5656>laborious<s%> <S%H4399>work,<s%> but you shall <S%H7126>present<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>' "
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"On <S%H389>exactly<s%> the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> day of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> is the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement;<s%> it shall be a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> for you, and you shall <S%H6031>humble<s%> your <S%H5315>souls<s%> and <S%H7126>present<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3808>"Neither<s%> shall you <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> on <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> for it is a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3725>atonement,<s%> to <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> on your <S%H5921>behalf<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3588>"If<s%> there is <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> will not <S%H6031>humble<s%> himself on <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> he shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from his <S%H9415>people.<s%>

"As for <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H5315>person<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6213>does<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> on <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6106>same<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H5315>person<s%> I will destroy from <S%H6>among<s%> his <S%H7130>people.<s%>

"You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> at <S%H3605>all.<s%> It is to be a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>dwelling<s%> <S%H4186>places.<s%>

"It is to be a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> of <S%H7677>complete<s%> <S%H7677>rest<s%> to you, and you shall <S%H6031>humble<s%> your <S%H5315>souls;<s%> on the <S%H8672>ninth<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>evening,<s%> from <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6153>evening<s%> you shall <S%H9581>keep<s%> your <S%H7676>sabbath.<s%>"
Again the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'On the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> is the <S%H2282>Feast<s%> of <S%H5521>Booths<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'On the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> is a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation;<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5656>laborious<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> of <S%H3605>any<s%> kind.

'For <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H7126>present<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%> On the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H1961>have<s%> a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocation<s%> and <S%H7126>present<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> it is an <S%H6116>assembly.<s%> You shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H5656>laborious<s%> <S%H4399>work.<s%>

<S%H428>'These<s%> are the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>times<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> as <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>convocations,<s%> to <S%H7126>present<s%> <S%H801>offerings<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> â€“ <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and grain <S%H4503>offerings,<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> and <S%H5262>libations,<s%> [each] <S%H3117>day<s%>'s <S%H1697>matter<s%> on its own day â€“

<S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> [those of] the <S%H7676>sabbaths<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> your <S%H4979>gifts,<s%> and <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5088>votive<s%> and <S%H5071>freewill<s%> <S%H5071>offerings,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'On <S%H389>exactly<s%> the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> when you have <S%H622>gathered<s%> in the <S%H8393>crops<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> you shall <S%H2287>celebrate<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> with a <S%H7677>rest<s%> on the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> and a <S%H7677>rest<s%> on the <S%H8066>eighth<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

'Now on the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> for yourselves the <S%H6529>foliage<s%> of <S%H1926>beautiful<s%> <S%H6086>trees,<s%> <S%H8558>palm<s%> <S%H3709>branches<s%> and <S%H6057>boughs<s%> of <S%H5687>leafy<s%> <S%H6086>trees<s%> and <S%H6155>willows<s%> of the <S%H5158>brook;<s%> and you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

'You shall thus <S%H2287>celebrate<s%> it [as] a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H8141>year.<s%> It [shall be] a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H2708>statute<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations;<s%> you shall <S%H2287>celebrate<s%> it in the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>
'You shall <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H5521>booths<s%> for <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the native-born in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H5521>booths,<s%>

<S%H4616>so<s%> that your <S%H1755>generations<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I had the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H5521>booths<s%> when I <S%H3318>brought<s%> them out from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>' "
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>declared<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> the <S%H4150>appointed<s%> <S%H4150>times<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
